main event: A round silvery object, approximately 50' in diameter, was observed moving erratically in various directions in Albuquerque, New Mexico on September 28, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting was observed through ground radar., The object disappeared at times during its movement., The object emitted several small silvery objects during flight., A weather balloon was released at Kirtland AFB shortly before the observation., The observer's reliability was estimated as good.
witness description: A 40-year-old civil service quality control representative living in Albuquerque.
